text: The 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup was the eighth FIFA Women's World Cup. It was hosted by France and ran from 7 June to 7 July 2019. France won the right to host the event in March 2015; the first time the country hosted the tournament, and the third time in Europe. Matches are planned for nine cities across France. The format of the tournament is 24 competing teams, including the host nation. The defending champions are the United States. Chile made its first appearance at this FIFA Women's World Cup edition, and Italy took part in the event for the first time since 1999. ==Teams== Team Qualified as Qualification date Appearance in the finals Consecutive streak Previous best performance FIFA Ranking 4th 3 5 2018 AFC Women's Asian Cup semi-finalist 7th 2 17 2018 AFC Women's Asian Cup semi-finalist 2nd 2 30 2018 AFC Women's Asian Cup semi- finalist 7th 7 6 2018 AFC Women's Asian Cup semi-finalist 8th 8 11 2018 AFC Women's Asian Cup fifth place 3rd 2 16 2018 Copa América Femenina champions 8th 8 8 2018 Copa América Femenina runners-up 1st 1 40 UEFA qualification group 7 winners 2nd 2 12 UEFA qualification group 6 winners 3rd 1 15 ==Venues== Lyon Paris Nice Montpellier Parc Olympique Lyonnais Parc des Princes Allianz Riviera Stade de la Mosson Capacity: 59,186 Capacity: 48,583 Capacity: 35,624 Capacity: 32,900 Rennes Roazhon Park Capacity: 29,164 Le Havre Valenciennes Reims Grenoble Stade Océane Stade du Hainaut Stade Auguste- Delaune Stade des Alpes Capacity: 25,178 Capacity: 25,172 Capacity: 21,127 Capacity: 20,068 ==Group stage== The match schedule for the tournament was released on 8 February 2018. All times are local, CEST (UTC+2). ===Group A=== \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- ===Group C=== \---- \---- ===Group D=== \---- \---- ===Group E=== \---- \---- ===Group F=== \---- \---- ===Ranking of third-placed teams=== The four best third-placed teams from the six groups go to the knockout stage along with the six group winners and six runners-up. ==Knockout stage== In the knockout stage, if a match is level at the end of 90 minutes of normal playing time, extra time is played (two periods of 15 minutes each), where each team is allowed to make a fourth substitution. If the score is still level after extra time, the winners are determined by a penalty shoot-out. ===Bracket=== ===Round of 16=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Quarter-finals=== \---- \---- \---- ===Semi-finals=== \---- ===Third place play-off=== ===Final=== == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2019 FIFA Women's World Cup FIFA Women's World Cup Category:Football in France Category:June 2019 events Category:July 2019 events
